Package org.example.service

Interface HODService

All Superinterfaces:
AccountService<HOD>, EmployeeService<HOD>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HODServiceImpl
public interface HODService extends AccountService<HOD>

Interface HODService

This is a HOD specific service. It extends AccountService

  • Method Details

    • getAllEngineers

      List<Engineer> getAllEngineers(String email, String password) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Get all engineers from the database
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Returns:
      A List of all Engineers
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD is not found

    • getAllComplaints

      List<Complaint> getAllComplaints(String email, String password) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Get all complaints from the database
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Returns:
      A List of all Complaints
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD is not found

    • getComplaint

      Complaint getComplaint(String email, String password, int complaintId) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Returns a complaint with the given id. All the FetchType.LAZY fields are set to null.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      Returns:
      The Complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the HOD or complaint is not found
      AuthenticationException - If the HOD is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized.

    • getComplaintsAssignedToEngineer

      List<Complaint> getComplaintsAssignedToEngineer(String email, String password, String engineerEmail) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Get all complaints assigned to an employee
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Returns:
      A List of all Complaints assigned to the employee
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD or employee is not found

    • assignExistingComplainToExistingEngineer

      void assignExistingComplainToExistingEngineer(String email, String password, int complaintId, String engineerEmail) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException, AlreadyExistException
      Assign an existing complaint to an existing employee
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD, complaint or employee is not found.
      AlreadyExistException - If the employee is already assigned to the complaint

    • removeExistingComplainFromExistingEngineer

      void removeExistingComplainFromExistingEngineer(String email, String password, int complaintId, String engineerEmail) throws AuthenticationException, NotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Removes an existing complaint from an existing employee
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD, complaint or employee is not found or the complaint is not assigned to the employee

    • createEngineerAccount

      void createEngineerAccount(String email, String password, String engineerEmail, String engineerForename, String engineerSurname, List<Address> addresses, List<Phone> phones, String engineerPassword) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException, AlreadyExistException
      Creates an employee account
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      password - The password of the HOD. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerEmail - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerForename - The forename of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerSurname - The surname of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      addresses - The list of address, of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      phones - The list of phones, of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      engineerPassword - The password for the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it is null
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the HOD email or password is incorrect
      AuthorizationException - If the HOD is not authorized to do the task.
      NotFoundException - If the HOD is not found
      AlreadyExistException - If the employee account already exists
